verse: स्वागमैः कल्पितैस्त्वं च जनान्मद्विमुखान्कुरु मां च गोपय येन स्यात्सृष्टिरेषोत्तरोत्तरा ॥ ७१-१०७

terms.मद्विमुखान्: (madvimukhān) - inclined towards me, turned towards me
terms.Translation: \"You create and protect me: crafted and imagined ways, so that the manifestation of creation happens, going from the highest to the highest."
